name: Gamma Gallery
author: ezhil

sections.description:
Gamma gallery is a stylish responsive image gallery for wordpress. It comes with a great full screen view and options for slideshow play/pause and automatically enhances itself to any resolution. version 1.4 supports native wordpress features like random order, include/exclude images, rearrange order. Use with the theme Pinpress to view a great mobile site.

This plugin was based on the tutorial from codrops
http://tympanus.net/codrops/2012/11/06/gamma-gallery-a-responsive-image-gallery-experiment/

See Demo

Main features

  • Responsive design
  • Montage image arrangements
  • fullscreen view
  • Slideshow with play pause
  • sync with wordpress gallery settings(order,include/exclude,random)
sections.installation: • Add and activate the plugin, thats it! No options.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • warnings generated due to plugin url has been resolved

1.1.1

  • path issue fixed

1.2

  • added support for 3.6 beta

1.3

  • path issue fixed

1.4

  • Default wordpress gallery features( from 3.5 ) like random, include/exclude images, rearrange order added

1.5

  • styles which overide existing body, html tag has been removed

1.6

  • Removed unwanted arguments in gallery

1.7

  • Removed thumnail args from arguments

1.8

  • New viewport for screen resolution 1500 has been added

short_description: A responsive wordpress gallery with montage image arrangement.
